# Bases
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

DIT <- read.csv("ENDES/DIT.csv", sep = ";" )
REC41 <- read.csv("ENDES/REC41.csv", sep = ";" )
REC42 <- read.csv("ENDES/REC42.csv", sep = ";" )
REC43 <- read.csv("ENDES/REC43.csv", sep = ";" )
REC95 <- read.csv("ENDES/REC95.csv", sep = ";" )
RECH0 <- read.csv("ENDES/RECH0.csv", sep = ";" )
RECH1 <- read.csv("ENDES/RECH1.csv", sep = ";" )
RECH23 <- read.csv("ENDES/RECH23.csv", sep = ";" )
```

#Joint
```{r}
DIT %>% select(CASEID,QI478,BIDX)

REC41 %>% select(CASEID,M15)

REC42 %>% select(CASEID,V481:V481X)

REC43 %>% select(CASEID,H1:H10)

REC95 %>% select(CASEID,S466,S466B,S45D4:S45IF2Y)

RECH0 %>% select(HHID,HV003,HV000:HV002A,HV005,HV022,HV007,HV008,HV021,HV023:HV026) %>% mutate(CASEID = stringr::str_pad(paste(HHID,HV003),10,side = "left",pad = "0"))

RECH1 %>% select(HHID,HVIDX,QH25A,HV122)

RECH23 %>% select(HHID,HV270)
```
